entry.sentence: Julien was just driving up the driveway , and the sun was accompanying him with its rays .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NNP Julien)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB just)) (VP (VBG driving) (PRT (RP up)) (NP (DT the) (NN driveway))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (DT the) (NN sun)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBG accompanying) (NP (PRP him)) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ its) (NNS rays)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(driving-4, Julien-1) aux(driving-4, was-2) advmod(driving-4, just-3) root(ROOT-0, driving-4) prt(driving-4, up-5) det(driveway-7, the-6) dobj(driving-4, driveway-7) det(sun-11, the-10) nsubj(accompanying-13, sun-11) aux(accompanying-13, was-12) conj_and(driving-4, accompanying-13) dobj(accompanying-13, him-14) poss(rays-17, its-16) prep_with(accompanying-13, rays-17)

entry.sentence: He would now go to her parents and they would call her down .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (MD would) (ADVP (RB now)) (VP (VB go) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS parents)))))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (MD would) (VP (VB call) (NP (PRP her)) (PRT (RP down))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(go-4, He-1) aux(go-4, would-2) advmod(go-4, now-3) root(ROOT-0, go-4) poss(parents-7, her-6) prep_to(go-4, parents-7) nsubj(call-11, they-9) aux(call-11, would-10) conj_and(go-4, call-11) dobj(call-11, her-12) prt(call-11, down-13)

entry.sentence: The first step into their new life ...
entry.parse: (ROOT (NP (NP (DT The) (JJ first) (NN step)) (PP (IN into) (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ new) (NN life))) (: ...)))
entry.deps: det(step-3, The-1) amod(step-3, first-2) root(ROOT-0, step-3) poss(life-7, their-5) amod(life-7, new-6) prep_into(step-3, life-7)
